it doesnt have mario so its alright

The incredible follow up for the amazing original Portal. 

Portal 2 takes place at least a few decades after the events of the original game in the abandoned Aperture Science facility.... but it won't be abandoned for long.

In Portal 2 you get to explore the long abandoned old sections of the facility that were built in the 1960's.

Portal 2 is full of drama, puzzles and comedy, you won't regret it.
pretty good game, the story on single player is epic and the coop is also epic

Even after a decade post-release, it's still one of the best games out there.

Portal 2 is one of best Valve games you can play now. I can say that game won't shock you now, but you will have your fun of solving riddles.

Gameplay is bewitching!!! Even if it is puzzle game. With portal gun you need to solve hard and not so riddles. Gradually you'll learn how about new subjects and how to use them and in the end you will spend more time on thinking about solving. 

Also I MUST mention Glados and Wheatley, these robots sometimes can make you laugh. They comment your level finishing and tell you information about world where you play.

This game also have multiplayer mode, you should try, if you have friend. Games like Portal 2 always have been a good way to spend time with someone. Multiplayer levels also good and interesting, you sometimes have to spend 10-15 minutes to understand what you have to do.

In the end I can say that game like indie game will help to chill out from AAA games or spend couple evenings with friend. This simple and interesting game worth your attantion!!!
I LOVE THIS GAME SO MUCH, sad that there's no really any reason to continue the series, but that's okay.
GREAT GAME, highly recommend playing with another friend, preferably someone with a decent iq overall great game
Everything about this game is amazing. The writing, acting, level design, mechanics, characters..it's all here and in full force. Everyone should play this game.
Jogo muito bom, fica melhor ainda jogando multiplayer

One of the best games Valve has ever made!

Physics-based puzzle game and for the most part is played at the your own pace - no hurry. The best part is the 2-person co-op mode which has community maps for endless challenges and fun.

He jugado Portal (2007) que me fascinÃ³ de una manera impresionante. Su secuela no fue buena... fue una obra maestra, lo mejor de lo mejor. Tengo 1 dÃ­a entero de juego (y 2 contando el primero) pero aun me falta mucho por hacer como la campaÃ±a cooperativa, los niveles de la comunidad hasta los mods creados por la comunidad (cuento que estoy jugando Portal Reloaded y luego Portal Stories: Mel, los dos muy recomendados). Es un juego que me dejo sin palabras de principio a fin. Con una historia buenÃ­sima que te cuenta detalles de todo el universo de Valve. Sin duda una joya que cualquier computadora puede correr y te hace pensar con cada parte del juego en sÃ­.

The game is still fun after all these years, the custom level designer is fun to mess around with and theres some really trippy/mind distorting amazing custom levels, just play this game what are you doing, that steam summer sale made this game super cheap
cool puzzles and story's to it, good game
This game is wonderful, if you somehow have not played it, now is a good time, the game has had a small resurgence that i hope will continue
